headers.subject: [tosdr:2229] People's Terms of Service Contract

html:
An interesting article about a possible way forward with ToS:

http://www.thenation.com/article/174441/fighting-facebook-campaign-peoples-terms-service

Today, the law protects these arrangements by assuming they were fairly negotiated, and thus reflect a “meeting of the minds” by equal parties. That is weird.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: People's Terms of Service Contract
text:
An interesting article about a possible way forward with ToS:

http://www.thenation.com/article/174441/fighting-facebook-campaign-peoples-terms-service

Today, the law protects these arrangements by *assuming *they were fairly 
> negotiated, and thus reflect a “meeting of the minds” by equal parties. 
> That is weird.
>

--
